subject: Giro d''Italia (Bicycle Race)
History
lead_paragraph: The Giro D'Italia is again making a point of celebrating Italy's great cycling heros, Fausto Coppi and Gino Bartali, this year.
snippet: The Giro D'Italia is again making a point of celebrating Italy's great cycling heros, Fausto Coppi and Gino Bartali, this year.
